introduction.title: Introduction
content: At Example Company, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
This privacy policy applies to all information collected through our website, mobile application, and/or any related services, sales, marketing, or events (collectively, the "Services").

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
informationCollected.intro: We collect several types of information from and about users of our Services, including:

items.title: Personal Identifiers
items.content: Name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other similar identifiers.

items.title: Account Information
items.content: Username, password, account preferences, and purchase history.

items.title: Payment Information
items.content: Credit card numbers, banking information, and billing addresses.

items.title: Usage Data
items.content: Information about how you use our website, products, and services.

items.title: Technical Data
items.content: IP address, browser type, operating system, device information, and other technology identifiers on the devices you use to access our Services.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.intro: We use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including:
items: To provide, maintain, and improve our Services.
To process and fulfill your orders and send related information, including order confirmations and invoices.
To send administrative information, such as updates to our terms, conditions, and policies.
To personalize your experience and deliver content and product offerings relevant to your interests.
To respond to your comments, questions, and requests and provide customer service.
To protect, investigate, and deter against fraudulent, unauthorized, or illegal activity.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We may share your personal information with:

items.title: Service Providers
items.content: We may share your information with third-party vendors, service providers, contractors, or agents who perform services for us.

items.title: Business Transfers
items.content: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

items.title: Compliance with Laws
items.content: We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so.

items.title: With Your Consent
items.content: We may share your information with third parties when you have given us your consent to do so.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
items: The right to access and receive a copy of your personal information.
The right to request rectification or correction of your personal information.
The right to request erasure of your personal information.
The right to restrict processing of your personal information.
The right to object to processing of your personal information.
yourRights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at {{email}}

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at: {{email}}
